description:
The Pordoi Pants for men are designed for demanding ascents and speedy descents – whatever the weather.

Thanks to the innovative C_Change™ Membrane From Schoeller®, these premium softshell pants react to sweat build-up with special moisture and temperature management: When it’s cold, the membrane closes – as soon as the body becomes too hot, the pores open to regulate the temperature.
Side zippers provide extra ventilation, while the fine merino wool lining and merino mesh inserts in the waistband ensure a pleasant feel on the skin. Protection against sharp edges on the inner leg and integrated gaiters coated with silicon on the inside make our premium softshell pants a reliable companion for a day in the snow.

So with the Pordoi Pants for men you’ll be ready for even the most challenging tours and can enjoy your winter adventure to the full..
name: Ortovox Pordoi Pants - Mens
